node_2.locution: JW : it would not be in the interest of banks to lend money to people who can’t afford to repay it. Unless the banks knew that someone else was going to meet their problem
node_2.proposition: it would not be in the interest of banks to lend money to people who can’t afford to repay it. Unless the banks knew that someone else was going to meet their problem
